Text:
Well it's the real deal, OK
Looks to be a TV-Rip, probably cropped to remove subtitles or something... Most of the end credits are missing, so that explains the wrong duration. Man I love this movie, been looking for it for ages... This is actually the only release of it on the net... Watchable but would prefer a dvd-rip...Anyways gave it 5/5 stars for actulally finding it, and being a good TV-rip...

Bongo
I'm looking forward to seeing this gem again! Tanks for posting, please keep seeding..!
i have trawled though all the torrents sites for this one! Thank you so much. my quest has ended. time to start a new.

orgpunk at 2006-01-14 21:28 CET:
Duration........01:27:10? On IMDB it says 1:33.

It's pal source, running 25fps. that's why it's shorter, one more frame per second.

Damn, I haven't seen this epic movie in almost 20years. So tempted for downloading this but I think I'll wait a month because it's going to be released in BLURAY!
